original_text: For Mordecai the Jew was next unto king Ahasuerus, and great among the Jews, and accepted of the multitude of his brethren, seeking the wealth of his people, and speaking peace to all his seed.
korean_text: 유다인 모르드개가 아하수에로 왕의 다음이 되고 유다인 중에 크게 존경받고 그의 허다한 형제에게 사랑을 받고 그의 백성의 이익을 도모하며 그의 모든 종족을 안위하였더라

sentences.original_text: and accepted of the multitude of his brethren
seeking the wealth of his people
and speaking peace to all his seed
